sentence.Network_en: In computer graphics, a light sensitive pick device that is pointed at the display surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 在计算机图形学中, 一种指点显示屏面的光敏信号选图装置.

sentence.Network_en: In photography, the essential light sensitive coating on ph otographic film comprising gelatine and silver salts.
sentence.Network_cn: 在照相技术中, 覆盖在照相底片上的由胶和银盐组成的感光物质.

sentence.Network_en: The light sensitive layer under normal circumstances is red brown baked.
sentence.Network_cn: 变态环境下感陡层烘烤后是赤棕色.

list.abs: 光敏度(light sensitivity)也叫光敏感度,视觉的敏感度可从绝对阈强度和辨别阈两方面来测量。绝对阈强度指在生理条件下能引起感觉的最小光量,即光阈,而其倒数即.
